translation: Recently I've been intrigued by something very interesting.
transcript: 在过去的一段时间啊，我做的一个事情非常有意思。

translation: If you ask me what I do for a living, I'd say I am a coach in influence.
transcript: 如果你想用一句话问问我到底是做什么的，我觉得我的工作呢，是一个影响力的教练。

translation: That might sound too abstract.
transcript: 这个话呀说起来好像很庞大。

translation: I'll explain it a little bit, since all of us here, including many of my colleagues, might be very interested in this term "influence".
transcript: 因为今天在座的很多同事或者在座的各位同仁，都可能非常关注什么叫做影响力。

translation: What I do is,  in short, help my clients summarize their thoughts, express their ideas and thus enhance their influence on other people.
transcript: 简言之，我帮助我的客户更好地聚集他们的思想，表达他们的观点，进而更好地影响他人。

translation: To make sure I can do a great job on that, I've done a lot of preparation work.
transcript: 为了来做这样的一件事情，我做了很多的准备和功课。

translation: A book I translated was recently published in China. Its name is "How To Deliver A TED Talk: Secrets Of The World's Most Inspiring Presentations".
transcript: 最近呢有一本刚刚上市的书叫《TED的秘密》，也是我刚刚翻译的。

translation: You might be very curious about what exactly influence is, and how we can make ourselves influential.
transcript: 各位同事都可能有一个好奇，影响力到底是什么？如何能够做到影响力？

translation: At the beginning of my speech today, I'll first say something about the clients I 've met in the past few years, many of whom were senior executives or CEOs.
transcript: 要我今天在这儿做一个演讲，我就不免要回忆一下过去几年我接触的客户，其中相当一部分都是企业的高管和CEO。

translation: Now you guess, what was the most frequent question those smart people asked me?
transcript: 跟这些聪明的人在一起打交道，他们到底问我什么问题？

translation: Why were they interested in influence?
transcript: 他们为什么对影响力如此的感兴趣？

translation: I remember being always asked, "How can I become someone successful like him?"
transcript: 回忆起来哈，第一个问题，问的最多的就是我怎么样能够成为他？

translation: Or, "Can you help me become that person?"
transcript: 要不然呢，我怎么样能够成为他？

translation: I would only disappoint them by replying, "I'm sorry.I can't.You are never going to be Jack Ma or Steve Jobs, because you are not them."
transcript: 我的答案不免让他们有点失望，我说对不起，我做不到，你既不可能成为马云也不可能成为乔布斯，因为他不是你。

translation: If I can help you become someone that is not yourself at all, I guess I might as well become a witch first.
transcript: 如果我能帮你做成一个根本不是你的这个人，那我认为巫师也许是我更合适的一个职业。

translation: I am thinking about one thing right now: many people seem to care about influence, but why?
transcript: 对于我今天的这样的一个演讲我有一个考虑，就是很多人很关注影响力，可是为什么今天大家有这样的一个关注？

translation: Only in this era is the influence on others so treasured.
transcript: 再没有任何一个时代像今天我们这个时代，如此看重影响他人的这样一个能力。

translation: So what exactly is influence?
transcript: 影响力究竟是什么？

translation: I'll quote and adapt the famous English writer Charles Dickens' words here to explain why influence is drawing so much attention.
transcript: 我想套用Charles Dickens，大家都知道一个非常著名的作家，他有一句非常非常有名的格言，我套用一下，来解释一下今天我们为什么那么关注所谓的影响力。

translation: It is the best of times, for wisdom is omnipresent; it is the worst of times, for wisdom is everywhere.
transcript: 这是一个最好的时代，因为智慧处处不在；这也是一个最差的时代，因为到处都是智慧。

translation: More specifically speaking, it is a good thing today that many people are willing to teach, guide and influence others.
transcript: 怎么讲呢，在今天这个时代有太多的人想去教导你、引导你、影响你。

translation: But if they overdo it, things might backfire.
transcript: 但换句话说，这个时代正是因为也有太多的人想去教导你、影响你、教育你，它又变成了一个最差的时代。

translation: We will finally find ourselves stuck in a dilemma, where we can either influence others, or be influenced by others.
transcript: 因为，我们发现自己最终啊，陷入了一种所谓的窘境，就是人只有两种选择，要么你去影响他人，要么你就被他人影响。

translation: Speaking of influence, I guess many people might wonder what constitute it.
transcript: 谈到影响力，我想不免很多人都会很好奇影响力的构建要素是什么？

translation: Why is influence so important for you?
transcript: 为什么有那么多人如此关注它？

translation: Now I want to ask you something:  what role are microblog and WeChat playing in your life?
transcript: 在座的各位同事首先我想问问大家一个问题，微博和微信在你的生活当中扮演怎样的一个角色？

translation: Please raise your hand if you use the two social-media tools.
transcript: 使用微博和微信的同事举个手，我看一下。

translation: Though I can't see quite clearly, I am sure almost everyone here is raising your hand.
transcript: 其实我看不到，但是我估计大家基本上都会举手。

translation: I'll tell you a cruel fact: as long as you follow more than one hundred people on microblog or WeChat, rest assured, you are, if information can be quantified, consuming as much information every day as the 18th century farmers did in their whole life.
transcript: 你们知道有一个非常非常残酷的现实，那就是只要你微信和微博关注的人超过一百个人，我可以负责任地告诉你，你每天消费的信息如果数字化的话，大致相当于十八世纪农民一辈子的消费。

translation: Scary, right?
transcript: 很可怕是吗？

translation: But that's an awkward truth belonging to this age.
transcript: 但它却是我们这个时代非常窘迫的一个现实。

translation: You've said something, but that doesn't mean you have influence.
transcript: 你讲了，你说了，不一定就有影响力。

translation: Your message might just be drowned.
transcript: 你讲了，很有可能这个信息就丧失掉了。

translation: Even if your words are heard, they might be interpreted differently due to differences in comprehension, educational background and temperament.
transcript: 你讲了，你说了，即便对方听到了，很有可能有一个问题在于每个人的理解能力、教育背景、性格特征，都会决定他对你信息的理解方式。

translation: When I give many clients counseling services, they will ask me, "I have conveyed my message, but why do people react differently?"
transcript: 你知道我在跟很多客户进行辅导的时候他们都会说，我把这个信息已经讲出来了，为什么大家有不同的感觉呢？

translation: There is a joke that's often told about a programmer .
transcript: 有一个段子是这么说的，我估计在座的各位可能有看过。

translation: The programmer's wife phoned him when he was on his way back home.
transcript: 程序员的老婆，在程序员下班的路上跟程序员打电话。

translation: She said, "Get me one kg of steamed stuffed buns on your way back. And if you see someone selling watermelons, get one for me."
transcript: 说：“你回来路上我买两呃给我买两斤包子，如果你看到个卖西瓜的，买一个。”

translation: Finally the programmer got home, with one stuffed bun in his hand.
transcript: 程序员就回来了，手里拿着一个包子。

translation: It might take a little while to get the punch line.
transcript: 这个梗需要稍微想一想哈，这个梗需要稍微想一想。

translation: So I'll repeat the joke.
transcript: 我再说一遍哈。

translation: The programmer's wife phoned him when he was on his way back home.
transcript: 程序员的老婆，在程序员回家的路上跟程序员打电话。

translation: She said, "Get me one kg of steamed stuffed buns on your way back. And if you see someone selling watermelons, get one for me."
transcript: “回来路上买两斤包子，如果看到个卖西瓜的，买一个。”

translation: When the programmer got home, he had only one stuffed bun in his hand.
transcript: 程序员回来了，手里拿着一个包子。

translation: His wife asked him why, and he answered that he was precisely following the If-then logic.
transcript: 然后问他为什么，这不if then句型吗？

translation: You see, one's influence is always limited.
transcript: 正是因为有这样那样的不同的限制，在今天这个社会我们对影响力的追求非常渴望。

translation: The time when lectures will be indiscriminately listened to is forever gone, no matter how high-ranking the lecturer is.
transcript: 只要你讲就会有人听的时代已经一去不复返，甭管你是多么的位高权重。

translation: In today's society, if a perfunctory lecture draws listeners, I'll think the listeners are great.
transcript: 在这个时代，如果你随便讲就会有人听，我会我觉得这个听众一定是伟大的。

translation: I mean, truly great.
transcript: 当我说伟大，我的意思是，各位，真正的伟大哦。

translation: This photo was secretly shot during the two sessions of China.
transcript: 这是姚明在参加两会的时候被记者偷拍的一张照片。

translation: You can hardly find anyone that is awake.
transcript: 你看这周边睡得东倒西歪的啊。

translation: Look at our big guy Yao Ming.
transcript: 你再看看姚明的表情。

translation: Well, he is opening his eyes wide, but actually he is also sleepy.
transcript: 怒目横视，其实他也很想睡。

translation: He just dare not sleep for fear that, given his supper height, his every move will be easily caught by the speakers in the front.
transcript: 但没办法个子太高，一闭眼主席台就看到了。

translation: Here a problem is revealed: we are facing very intense competition today.
transcript: 所以这今天这个时代你会发现一个很大的问题就是，我们已经啊面临一个非常激烈的竞争。

translation: That's why it is necessary for all of us here to think about what true influence is.
transcript: 这就是为什么在座的每一位同事都要思考一下，究竟什么才是真正的影响影响力。

translation: In my opinion, everybody has his own influence.
transcript: 在我的观点当中，各位，每一个人都有影响的。

translation: It is not just that I stand here today to influence you.
transcript: 不是今天我站在这儿我试图去影响你。

translation: You are also influencing me.
transcript: 你今天坐在下面也能影响我。

translation: Your reaction is exerting a profound influence on me.
transcript: 因为你的反应很深刻地影响到了我。

translation: What exactly is influence?
transcript: 影响力到底是什么？

translation: This is the most important question I pose today.
transcript: 这是我今天抛出来最重要的一个话题。

translation: According to Cihai, influence means one's capacity to change the thoughts and behavior of other people.
transcript: 《辞海》上的解释就是你改变他人思想，改变他人行为的一种能力。

translation: For me this definition is a bit too rough and sounds like some mysterious power owned by gods or demons.
transcript: 我觉得这个解释太过于粗糙了，甚至有点儿神怪论。

translation: What is influence?
transcript: 什么叫做影响力？

translation: I'll explain it with a picture, which I think is a perfect illustration of influence.
transcript: 接下来我给大家一张图，这张图是我认为对影响力非常好的一个阐释。

translation: It's a very simple picture.
transcript: 它是一张非常非常简单的图。

translation: But I wish you could give it a really close look and try to figure out why it contains the connotation of influence.
transcript: 但是我的请求是请你认真地看，认真地体会，为什么它里头存在影响力。

translation: Simple as it is, the picture might precisely reflect what true influence should be like.
transcript: 这张图非常简单，但是我认为这张图恰恰折射出了真正的影响力应该是怎样的。

translation: Now look at this M&M'S chocolate peanut, do you have the feeling that this red one has a peculiar enchantment—and it just intrigues us?
transcript: 你有没有一种感觉，红色的m豆儿，这是一个m豆儿哈，红色的m豆儿具备了某种特殊的魔力，某种特殊的魅力，因为有一个词叫做enchantment，也就是吸引他人的一种魅力。

translation: Now suppose you have to handle the red chocolate peanut in two different ways.
transcript: 我希望大家做两种设想。

translation: Think what different feelings you will have then.
transcript: 这两种设想你看看你的感受是不是一样的。

translation: The first way is to pick up the red chocolate peanut, throw it among the yellow ones and then mix them up.
transcript: 第一种设想，请你拎起你的手将这个小小的m豆儿，扔到那一群黄色的m豆儿当中去，打乱。

translation: How will you feel?
transcript: 你有什么感觉？

translation: Just a bunch of chocolate peanuts, you might say, let's eat them.
transcript: 一堆豆子而已，吃了再说。

translation: Or you could think from a different angle.
transcript: 或者换一个角度，你再做一个设想。

translation: Suppose you paint the red chocolate peanut with a different color, say, yellow, and leave it where it is right now.
transcript: 把这个红色的m豆儿，给我填充一个颜色，变成黄色的m豆儿仍然放在这个位置。

translation: Will it be as charming as before?
transcript: 它有类似的力量吗？

translation: I really doubt that.
transcript: 也许会弱很多。

translation: The picture reveals two things about influence.
transcript: 其实我认为影响力就在于这张图上所折射出来的两点，各位同事。

translation: First, your influence is dependent on your position.
transcript: 第一，你的影响力来自于你所处的位置。

translation: Whether you are a chocolate peanut or not, whatever you may look like, whatever color you are painted with, your position decides your influence.
transcript: 甭管你是一个普通的豆子，甭管你什么颜色，你所处的位置决定了你的影响力。

translation: So long as you are willing to come out, you will be noticed and heard.
transcript: 也就是说当你愿意走出来的时候就一定会有影响力。

translation: During my counseling sessions with the clients, I found that a universal problem with the clients was that they never spoke in public.
transcript: 在我辅导的很多客户的过程当中大家普遍的反馈就是我从来没有出来讲过话。

translation: Nor did they feel that necessary.
transcript: 我从来不需要出来讲过话。

translation: They were easy to feel nervous, and preferred to be inconspicuous in the crowd.
transcript: 我觉得我很紧张，所以我还是在人群中淹没中淹没着比较好。

translation: My response to their problem was, "No matter what you say on the stage, so long as you come to the stage and give others a chance to observe you from a certain angle, so long as you insert an interval between you and them, you will have influence."
transcript: 我的回应是这样的，甭管你站在台上讲什么东西，只要你站在这个位置让大家有一个观察你的视角，让大家有一个距离的考虑，你就有了影响力。

translation: Second, if you are just a yellow chocolate, like all the other yellow chocolate peanuts around you, even though you are put on center stage, you will have little influence.
transcript: 第二，很显然，如果你成为那一群那一群黄色的m豆儿，即便你在这个位置，这个影响力仍然是弱的。

translation: But if you make yourself red, then everything will be different.
transcript: 如果你成为那个红色的m豆儿。

translation: Actually, every one of us has an inner red chocolate peanut.
transcript: 各位，其实每个人内心当中都有那一点点红色的m豆儿。

translation: So where can we find it?
transcript: 你的红色m豆儿在哪里？

translation: Always remember that it lies in where we are different from others.
transcript: 让别人觉得你跟他人不同的地方。

translation: Similar exploration into influence could even be traced back to thousands of years ago.
transcript: 其实人类对于影响力的这种思考几千年以来我们都有相似的关注。

translation: There is an example from the time of the cavemen.
transcript: 有一件事儿，自从东洞穴时代开始，各位，自从洞穴时代开始。

translation: Now, I bet that, on hearing the word "cavemen", you will instantly prick up your ears.
transcript: 只要我说如下的一句话，你马上竖起耳朵听。

translation: What I am doing is unimportant to you, but the word "cavemen" is irresistible.
transcript: 甭管我现在在做什么，我说这句话你马上竖起耳朵听。

translation: So what exactly is the example?
transcript: 什么事儿呢？

translation: Let me tell you this story.
transcript: 接下来跟大家分享一个故事。

translation: Here, please pay attention.
transcript: 注意。

translation: No matter whether this is going to be a good story, people just can't wait to listen to it.
transcript: 甭管故事是什么啊，只要我说分享一个故事。

translation: Like the good lecturer before me.
transcript: 刚才我们前一位讲者讲得非常好。

translation: Did you notice that, no matter what message he wanted to convey, when he mentioned he would tell a story that had deeply touched him, he was making his story a carrier of great influence?
transcript: 大家有没有注意到，甭管他说了多少信息，当他说接下来我要给大家讲一个我内心非常非常深刻感动的故事的时候，故事成了一种巨大的影响力载体。

translation: In my opinion, influence requires two important things.
transcript: 在我看来，影响力就是我们一定要搞清楚如下两点的突破。

translation: First, authenticity.
transcript: 第一， 真实，Authenticity。

translation: Many people may not be convinced of their own influence unless they think or act like somebody else who is successful.
transcript: 很多人都会觉得我需要去演得像谁或者像谁一样的方式。

translation: They are careful to imitate others' manners, gestures and looks.
transcript: 用什么样的手势，用什么样的眼神，我才会具有所谓的影响力。

translation: I often told my clients that all those efforts at imitation are futile.
transcript: 在我的辅导客户当中，我认为这种东西是徒劳的。

translation: You can never become a person who is not you.
transcript: 你永远无法成为一个你根本不是的人。

translation: If you admire Jack Ma, that's OK.
transcript: 所以如果你欣赏马云，可以。

translation: But if you want to become him, that's extremely hard.
transcript: 但是你想成为马云，很难。

translation: There is a person who is very influential on the internet these days.
transcript: 最近很火的，大家都知道在网络上非常非常有这个所谓影响力某个人哈。

translation: His name is Luo Yonghao, and he has just launched his Hammer phone. I happen to have some short-term ties to him during work.
transcript: 我跟他可能有一点短暂的这个工作上一些这个接触和交集，刚刚发布了锤子手机的罗永浩。

translation: Using what humble experience I have accumulated in lecturing, I can find that when Luo Yonghao was giving his speech during the product presentation, he was not at his best, given the way how he frequently paced up and down and fiddled with his laser pointer, combined with his not-so-perfect voice and tone.
transcript: 其实如果我今天斗胆在这儿用演讲学的角度来做一个分享的话我会发现，他的整个过程当中不断地自己的踱步，玩弄自己的所谓翻页笔，整个人的声音，整个人的这种所谓的语调，并不是最佳的状态。

translation: But one thing is clear: no matter what you think of this person or his product, he is very successful in attracting investment.
transcript: 但是有一点，甭管你对他的产品或对他这个人有怎样的看法，之所以这么多人愿意通过他的忽悠去投资给他。

translation: The most important reason for that would be an influence based on authenticity.
transcript: 我想一点，真实是非常重要的影响力。

translation: On the stage you might look as if you are shrinking back, because that's the way you are.
transcript: 你在这儿可能很收缩，因为你就是个收缩的人。

translation: If you say, "I am shy with people and I'd prefer to stay unnoticed", that'll be OK.
transcript: 你说我就是一个很收缩的人，我愿意退在后面，没问题。

translation: Hang back as you should.
transcript: 你收缩就应该收缩。

translation: But if amazing ideas can flow out of your mouth even under that obscured circumstance, that will definitely earn you extra credits.
transcript: 如果你愿意收缩可你表达的思想却是让大家超乎感觉、超乎预期的，那就是最棒的。

translation: There is a book listed among Amazon's best books.
transcript: 亚马逊目前的排行榜上有一个非常非常棒的书。

translation: Its author is named Susan Cain, who is also a TED lecturer.
transcript: 这个书的作者同时也是TED的这个演讲这一个呃演讲者哈，她的名字叫做Susan Cain。

translation: I think it's really a good book.
transcript: 这本书我觉得非常好。

translation: The name is Quiet：The Power of Introverts in a World that Can’t Stop Talking.
transcript: 书的名字叫做《Quiet：The Power of Introverts in a world that can’t stop talking》，在一个永远停不下来讲话的世界当中，内向者有怎样的力量。

translation: There is a very convincing idea in this book, namely that the power of introverts lies in their calm state, in which they could think deeply and produce something beyond expectation.
transcript: 我觉得这本书里面有一个非常非常好的解释，那就是内向者的力量就在于他的沉稳，他的思这种这种思考，他的这种精炼，他能够做出你觉得很超预期的东西。

translation: Aside from authenticity, the second thing required by influence, as the foregoing implies, is uniqueness.
transcript: 除了我们讲到的所谓真实，还有一点就是像刚才故事所表现的一样，除了真实，你还需要独特。

translation: You can't be an ordinary yellow chocolate peanut.
transcript: 你还是是那个不是黄色糖衣的那个m豆。

translation: Instead, you must become the red one, which is both authentic and unique.
transcript: 而是那个红色糖衣的m豆，真实而又独特。

translation: Uniqueness means you can present something that people might not notice or know about.
transcript: 独特就是你一定能够讲出他大家可能不是那么关注的或者说不是那么这个这个这个了解过的一些信息，但是你能把它表现出来。

translation: For example, a friend of mine called Gary often gives me the same example when we talk about uniqueness.
transcript: 比如说某一种演讲，我的好朋友Gary老师，是我另外一个很好的朋友，经常讲的一个例子。

translation: If during a lecture, the voice, appearance and manners of the lecturer are all perfect, if the lecture is by no means lacking in content or logic, yet it just keeps eluding your ears, can you think of the reason?
transcript: 某一种演讲，那个演讲者声音、长相、气质都非常好，内容非常完整，逻辑非常严谨，跟听众非常相关，可是你就不认真听，各位能想到是什么情况吗？

translation: The lecturer's look, voice and gestures are all expressive.
transcript: 眼神、声音、手势都非常好。

translation: The content is of high quality, and what's more important, closely related with what you need.
transcript: 内容非常好，关键是跟你的这种所谓的需求非常关联。

translation: But you just don't want to listen.
transcript: 可是你就不认真听。

translation: So what are you thinking?
transcript: 你脑袋里面有什么样的构想？

translation: I'll tell you why.
transcript: 我告诉大家吧。

translation: I take nearly seventy flights every year.
transcript: 我一年要飞将近七十趟飞机。

translation: You might all have heard one lecture on board: the safety precautions.
transcript: 有一种演讲你可能见过：下面广播安全须知。

translation: Oxygen masks are over your head.
transcript: 氧气面罩在您的上方。

translation: Life jackets are under your seat.
transcript: 救生衣在您的下方。

translation: But you can also see that passengers just ignore what they hear.
transcript: 你看周边该睡觉的睡觉，该该这个呃聊天的聊天，该该干嘛干嘛，玩儿游戏的玩儿游戏。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: Because there is nothing unique.
transcript: 因为你讲的东西没有独特性。

translation: Passengers have already heard the same words repeatedly for hundreds of times.
transcript: 大家觉得听过百八十遍了。

translation: Only one sort of person would listen very carefully.
transcript: 只有一类人会非常非常认真地听。

translation: Who?
transcript: 谁呀？

translation: Travellers who take flight for the first time.
transcript: 第一次坐飞机的。

translation: In other words, if we present the safety precautions in a different way, I guess no passenger on board would bear to distract themselves while listening.
transcript: 或者换句话说，如果这么样做一个所谓安全须知，我估计所有人都会非常认真地听。

translation: For example, we can start the instructions with this sentence: please get seated and look out the left window.
transcript: 接下来广播安全须知，请大家坐好了往左舷窗看。

translation: The engine of the plane is already ignited.
transcript: 我们的飞机发动机已经着火了。

translation: That's uniqueness.
transcript: 独特。

translation: You should use something others don't notice to express your ideas.
transcript: 去寻找那些他人所不具备的信息、能力或表表现，表达。

translation: That reminds of a theory that I never quite agree with.
transcript: 所以在这一点我非常非常不愿意表达我同意观点的一个所谓的概念。

translation: It's called the Short Plate Theory.
transcript: 就是叫做短板理论。

translation: If a cask has a short plate, water will easily spill out.
transcript: 就是说有一个木桶最短的那个板子然后就把这个水泄下来了。

translation: So the short plate must be viewed as a priority to be mended.
transcript: 所以你要补那个短板。

translation: But the problem is that, when you concentrate all your energy on fixing the short plate, the short plate will finally become no more than an ordinarily long plate, just like one of the ordinary yellow chocolate peanuts I mentioned earlier.
transcript: 当你发现你用尽所有的全力去补你的短板的时候，最后补起来也就变成了跟普通人一样的那个黄色的m豆。

translation: You spend twenty years in bridging the gap between your weakness and others' strength, so what?
transcript: 你花了二十年把一个自己不擅长的东西最后补成了跟其他人一样，那又怎样？

translation: That tells a lot about the logic of influence.
transcript: 所有的影响力来自于这样的一个表述。

translation: Einstein once said, "Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid."
transcript: 爱因斯坦有一句话说得非常好，Everyone is a genius，每一个人都是一个天才，but if you judge a fish on its ability to climb a tree，如果你呀用爬树的能力去考虑一个鱼到底有怎样的能力，他最后会穷其一生发现这是一件多么愚蠢的事情。

translation: It will finally realize that all his labor might be a silly mistake.
transcript: 他会穷其一生发现自己做了这么多，原来是一件很愚蠢的事情。

translation: So here I'd like to sum up the true constituents of influence: authenticity and uniqueness.
transcript: 所以我在这儿，我想最后作一个总结，影响力真正的来源：真实而独特。

translation: If you ask me how we can be authentic and unique, you may take a good look at the Chinese inspirational stories telling how penniless young people reverse their fate.
transcript: 而如果你告诉我影响力真正如何能够做到真实而独特，在中国：屌丝的逆袭。

translation: Almost all those stories are successfully circulated in the business world, because they follow the logic of influence: authentic and unique.
transcript: 几乎所有的故事今天在商业传播当中非常厉害的真实而独特，那就是屌丝的逆袭，屌丝：真实；独特：逆袭。

translation: Take Yu Minhong for example.
transcript: 俞敏洪说。

translation: He said he used to live in a 3-square-meter basement with his wife, and hadn't been abroad when he was thirty.
transcript: 我3我在3平米的这个地下室里面，跟老婆三十岁了也还没有出出过国。

translation: Compared with his friends, his life was terribly miserable.
transcript: 我所有的周边人全部出国了，我要多惨有多惨，我比你更惨。

translation: You might respond, "Wow, that's what real life is like!"
transcript: 你会觉得，哇太真实了。

translation: Then do you know how he has reversed his fate?
transcript: 什么叫做逆袭？

translation: Because he suddenly changed the subject and said, "Yesterday I had a dinner with Warren Buffett".
transcript: 然后转眼一说，昨天我跟巴菲特一起吃饭的时候。

translation: That is a good example of how to enhance one's influence.
transcript: 这就具备了是一种非常强大的影响。

translation: I'll emphasize my point again: influence comes from authenticity and uniqueness.
transcript: 每一位在座的我今天最后的观点：真实而独特是你影响力的来源。

translation: Who stole our influence?
transcript: 谁偷走了你的影响力？

translation: The answer for me is our misunderstanding.
transcript: 在我看来，就是这样的一个误解。

translation: Who specifically stole our influence?
transcript: 如果一句话，谁偷走了你的影响力？

translation: The delusion that we should become someone else stole our influence.
transcript: 成为他人的这种错觉，偷走了你的影响力。

translation: You can never be somebody else.
transcript: 想成为他人是徒劳的。

translation: You can only be yourself.
transcript: 你只能成为你自己。

translation: Last, I'd like to end my speech with Oscar Wilde's words: Be yourself, because everyone else is already taken.
transcript: 最后，Oscar Wilde奥斯卡·王尔德有一句非常好的话：Be yourself ，because everyone else is already taken.

translation: Be yourself, because everyone else is already taken.
transcript: 你只能做你自己，因为其他人已经被别人占了。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 非常感谢大家，谢谢！
